question.content:
Given an array nums of integers, a move consists of choosing any element and decreasing it by 1.

An array A is a zigzag array if either:

  • Every even-indexed element is greater than adjacent elements, ie. A[0] > A[1] < A[2] > A[3] < A[4] > ...
  • OR, every odd-indexed element is greater than adjacent elements, ie. A[0] < A[1] > A[2] < A[3] > A[4] < ...

Return the minimum number of moves to transform the given array nums into a zigzag array.

 

Example 1:

Input: nums = [1,2,3]
Output: 2
Explanation: We can decrease 2 to 0 or 3 to 1.

Example 2:

Input: nums = [9,6,1,6,2]
Output: 4

 

Constraints:

  • 1 <= nums.length <= 1000
  • 1 <= nums[i] <= 1000
hints: Do each case (even indexed is greater, odd indexed is greater) separately. In say the even case, you should decrease each even-indexed element until it is lower than its immediate neighbors.

question.title: Decrease Elements To Make Array Zigzag
question.translatedContent:
给你一个整数数组 nums，每次 操作 会从中选择一个元素并 将该元素的值减少 1。

如果符合下列情况之一，则数组 A 就是 锯齿数组：

  • 每个偶数索引对应的元素都大于相邻的元素，即 A[0] > A[1] < A[2] > A[3] < A[4] > ...
  • 或者，每个奇数索引对应的元素都大于相邻的元素，即 A[0] < A[1] > A[2] < A[3] > A[4] < ...

返回将数组 nums 转换为锯齿数组所需的最小操作次数。

 

示例 1：

输入：nums = [1,2,3]
输出：2
解释：我们可以把 2 递减到 0，或把 3 递减到 1。

示例 2：

输入：nums = [9,6,1,6,2]
输出：4

 

提示：

  • 1 <= nums.length <= 1000
  • 1 <= nums[i] <= 1000
